data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 6,200 citizens of Funafuti, Tuvalu, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Funafuti, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 6,200 souls living in the state of Funafuti with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Funafuti, Tuvalu that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Funafuti
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Senala Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Senala Village, Funafuti, Tuvalu.
Father, convict the 1,435 believers in Funafuti to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Funafuti to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the state of Funafuti, Tuvalu has a population of 6,200.

We estimate Funafuti has 1,435 people who might know Jesus, 4,694 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 71 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Funafuti, Tuvalu a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
